about:
I’m Aishwarya Jadhav, a strategic and data-driven Growth, Marketing, and Sales Consultant with over 4 years of experience helping brands accelerate digital transformation, optimize marketing ROI, and deliver personalized customer experiences.


My expertise spans across digital marketing, marketing analytics, CRM optimization, customer segmentation, and campaign management in both B2B and B2C sectors. I’ve successfully executed growth strategies using tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and Google Analytics, while building actionable dashboards and performance metrics through Excel and Tableau.


Currently pursuing my MBA (STEM) in Digital Marketing and Project Management, I’m passionate about combining creativity with data to drive business impact. I thrive at the intersection of marketing strategy, technology, and customer behavior — always aiming to turn insights into results.
